short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Publicly archive and preserve any public webpage using the archive.today, archive.is, archive.ph, archive.vn service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A companion tool to archive webpage with archive.today

Adds a button to the Chrome toolbar. When clicked, it archives your current url using archive.today which will preserve a snapshot of the page, opening the result in a new tab.

This is a Manifest v3 compliment app that aims to be better than other similar chrome web extensions.   

New Features:
⭐️Substack email nag screens are now bypassed
⭐️Protects user privacy by removing tracking parts of the archive

See the code for yourself here: https://github.com/gabefair/Archive-Webpage
Get the companion android app here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.gnosco.share2archivetoday
